original_text: We must continue to trust Christ very well, as we did when we first believed in him. We must continue to trust him until the end of our lives. Then we will share in everything that is his. We must continue to trust Christ very well, as we did when we first believed in him. We must continue to trust him until the end of our lives. Then we will share in everything that is his.
korean_text: 우리가 시작할 때에 확신한 것을 끝까지 견고히 잡고 있으면 그리스도와 함께 참여한 자가 되리라

sentences.original_text: We must continue to trust Christ very well
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그리스도를 매우 잘 계속 믿어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: as we did when we first believed in him
We must continue to trust him
until the end of our lives
Then we will share in everything that is his
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리는 그의 모든 것을 함께 누릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: We must continue to trust Christ very well
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그리스도를 매우 잘 계속 믿어야 합니다

Then we will share in everything that is his
